title: ISSS624
text: This course is ISSS624 Geospatial Analytics.

title: In-class Exercise
text:
Importing polygon feature dataframe

mpsz<-st_read(dsn='data/geospatial',layer='MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL')

Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `/Users/belinda/berwsm/ISSS624/inClassEx/inClassEx1/data/geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21


Geometry column in blob or list in R indicates if polygon, line or point.
The message above reveals that the geospatial objects are multipolygon features. There are a total of 323 multipolygon features and 15 fields in mpsz simple feature data frame. mpsz is in svy21projected coordinates systems. The bounding box provides the x extend and y extend of the data.

title: In-class Exercise
section: Importing polyline feature data in shapefile form
text:
Importing polyline feature data in shapefile form

cyclingpath = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "CyclingPath")

Reading layer `CyclingPath' from data source 
  `/Users/belinda/berwsm/ISSS624/inClassEx/inClassEx1/data/geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 1625 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: LINESTRING
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 12711.19 ymin: 28711.33 xmax: 42626.09 ymax: 48948.15
Projected CRS: SVY21


The message above reveals that there are a total of 1625 features and 2 fields in cyclingpathlinestring feature data frame and it is in svy21 projected coordinates system too.

title: In-class Exercise
section: Importing GIS data in kml format and transforming into projected coordinates system
text:
Importing GIS data in kml format and transforming into projected coordinates system

preschool = st_read("data/geospatial/pre-schools-location-kml.kml") %>%
  st_transform(crs=3414)

Reading layer `PRESCHOOLS_LOCATION' from data source 
  `/Users/belinda/berwsm/ISSS624/inClassEx/inClassEx1/data/geospatial/pre-schools-location-kml.kml' 
  using driver `KML'
Simple feature collection with 1359 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6824 ymin: 1.248403 xmax: 103.9897 ymax: 1.462134
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84


The message above reveals that preschool is a point feature data frame. There are a total of 1359 features and 2 fields. Different from the previous two simple feature data frame, preschool is in wgs84 coordinates system (long,lat).
Conversion to SVY21 using st_transform with code 3414.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
Importing polygon feature data

mpsz<-st_read(dsn='data/geospatial',layer='MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL')

Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `/Users/belinda/berwsm/ISSS624/handsOnEx1/data/geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
